categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A female individual served as an instructor for Jedi Initiates at the Jedi Temple on the Republic's capital world, Coruscant in 19 BBY. During that year, the Jedi met the bounty hunter Boba Fett in a corridor at the temple and showed him his quarters. Shortly after meeting Fett, a youngling of her group called Veda recognized Jedi Master Mace Windu passing by and went to him to ask the senior Jedi a "very important question," much to the distress of her instructor.
The instructor appeared in Boba Fett: Pursuit, a young readers' novel written by Elizabeth Hand and published in 2004.
